definition[0]: a shrill sound is very high and unpleasant
example[0]: ‘That’s not true, ’ she protested in a shrill voice.
definition[1]: shrill complaints, criticism, demands etc are too loud or strong and seem unreasonable
example[3]: He hated the shrill demands of the children.
definition[2]: to produce a very high and unpleasant sound
definition[3]: to say something in a very high voice
